data.md:MetaData: Split core images of BBBCP Hole GMH11-3A
Gillmore Hill, ~27.5km SSE of Powell, Wyoming, USA, Drill rig: CS-1500, truck mounted. FD 202.42m, 202.17m drilled, Total Recovery 200.88 =99.36%
Bighorn Basin Coring Project (BBCP) - Targeted Continental Drilling Of Paleogene Hyperthermals (BBCP) / Public Data
